name: Venti
desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Cecilia
materials.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

materials.name: Hurricane Seed
materials.desc:
The imploded form of an Anemo Hypostasis upon its defeat.
Contains the essence of Anemo energy.
It is said that the power to create hurricanes resides within its seemingly fragile body. This butterfly of pure Anemo energy must surely be waiting for the day when it can conjure up storms once again.

materials.name: Cecilia
materials.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>November 22, 2019</color>
A bard as free as the wind, now residing in the city of dandelions.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1197818764558888960</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 24, 2019</color>
"The true feelings of the prodigal son. "
— The whisperings of the Cecelia flowers.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1198451187374284800</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 3, 2020</color>
No one knows where the bard named Venti is from, but you can always feel the free-flowing wind in his voice.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/74964</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 12, 2025</color>
Hello, Traveler! Here are some notes about the bard from Mondstadt, Venti. Let's check them out together!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/38189904</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2020</color>
The tune you just hummed away, is it one that I oft play?
Ah, so it's "Happy Birthday" you were just humming?
Then please, continue, and I shall keep strumming! Eh-he!
Thanks to @呜拉祖啦 for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/13465</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2021</color>
Oh, is this apple for me? Haha, that won't do, come share this apple with me.
Split it open like this...and you will feel the breeze from the apple core.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/456028</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2021</color>
"Paimon's back! Paimon picked a lot of big, fresh apples! Hey, where did the Traveler and Tone-Deaf Bard go?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/456030</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2022</color>
"Hey, Tone-Deaf Bard, we've been looking for you! Didn't expect you to be here!"
"Haha, Traveler and Paimon! You guys came just in time. Here, special apple juice made just for you. Try it~"
"Hey! Where's the special apple juice for Paimon!?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5441233</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2022</color>
Yahoo~ Look up, I'm here!
It's been a long time, my warrior, ready to tell me your new story?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5441234</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2023</color>
"Together with you, even apples taste sweeter."
"But something isn't quite right, it feels like... I'm gonna s—sneeze."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19383320</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2023</color>
Caught you~!
The farther your journey takes you, the less time we have to spend together in Mondstadt.
But... I knew I'd run into you today.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19383336</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2024</color>
The morning sun is pretty pleasant, isn't it? Ehe, you can barely keep your eyes open.
Here, come sit with me and enjoy the scent of Cecilias! They'll perk you up.
Ah, I lost track of time just chatting with you... Wait just a moment, I'm almost done!
You haven't eaten apple pie in a long time, have you? Then I'll make us breakfast today~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/29927819</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2025</color>
"Apples are truly wonderful. You can eat them, make cider with them... Why, there's no problem that can't be solved by throwing apples at it! Mm-mmm~"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/39353500</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 16, 2025</color>
Hmm~ Whew, the weather today's just perfect for relaxing atop a tree.
Compared to the terribly exciting life I've been leading lately, this kind of leisurely routine just suits me better.
Thanks to you, Mondstadt was able to pull through its time of crisis and return to a time of peace. That means I get to return to being an easy-going bard again!
Mayhaps I shall grace you with a song written in your honor, as an expression of my thanks? Hear ye, hear ye, my gratitude already rustles like a melody through the leaves!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/39353501</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 18, 2020</color>
"Shine Beyond the Horizon, Young Hero"
We're off to distant lands, Traveler!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1295532867938693121</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 13, 2021</color>
"A long-suffering task makes the idle moments all the more precious." "Ehe~"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/185198</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 18, 2021</color>
With the Windblume Festival approaching fast, the TikTok short video event is also about to kick off! Send us your original short clips for a chance to obtain great cash prizes and Genshin Impact merchandise!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/252399</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 3, 2021</color>
The free and peaceful Mondstadt, as well as the bustling port of Liyue, mark every step of your journey.
The melodies of wind and rock intertwine on a whole new stage to compose a unique chapter of your adventure.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1125509</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 8, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Paimon has prepared 2.1 and 2.2 version game promotional images for computer and mobile phone wallpapers for travelers this time.
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.bilibili.com/opus/590582591891088011</color>
"This Kätzlein Cocktail Is Amazing! Aaa... Achoo!"

<color=#ffd780>March 30, 2022</color>
"It wasn't easy getting someone to order a Kätzlein Cocktail!"
"This exquisite and peculiar flavor is definitely worthy of the Kätzlein Cocktail's fame! Thank you so much— Aaa... Achoo!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4029019</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 15, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Thai]</color>
It's a really nice day. I hope everyone has a very happy Songkran Festival~
<color=#80c0ff>Facebook:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.facebook.com/genshinimpact.th/posts/1902504883472962</color>
"Hues of the Violet Garden" - Wallpaper Series
"Canvas of Starlight Memories" Web Event Wallpapers
"Dream of Roving Stars" Web Event Wallpapers

<color=#ffd780>September 28, 2024</color>
As promised, a cake appeared in the dream,
as the colorful candle flames danced with riveting emotions.
They said: May you forge ahead bravely, may your performances draw a sold-out crowd, may your dreams come true, may you shine like gold, and may you be as free as the wind.
Now, blow out the candles—
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/33701422</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 30, 2025</color>
"Hmm... A new non-alcoholic recipe. The taste still has room for further adjustments."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/38517623</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 30, 2025</color>
Hello, Travelers! Here's the June wallpapers (PC/Mobile/Apple Watch) for you~ Feel free to save and use them as you like~
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1928285237823295489</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 24, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello fellow travelers, the number of fans on the official Weibo of "Genshin Impact" has exceeded 2 million.
<color=#80c0ff>Weibo:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/m.weibo.cn/status/4684924898250180</color>
Genshin Impact JP Twitter - 2 Million Followers

<color=#ffd780>April 22, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Tabibito, the number of official Twitter followers has exceeded 2 million and the number of subscriptions to the official YouTube channel has exceeded 1 million!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1517443093305249793</color>
Genshin Impact JP Twitter - 2.1 Million Followers

<color=#ffd780>May 8, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Tabibito, the number of official Twitter followers has exceeded 2.1 million!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1523150704596197376</color>
Genshin Impact JP Twitter - 2.7 Million Followers

<color=#ffd780>November 24, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Tabibito, the number of official Twitter followers has exceeded 2.7 million!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1595718877668954113</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 23, 2023</color>
#GenshinImpact has reached 10 million followers across all its language accounts on Twitter (X)!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1694201878077403292</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 14, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
As announced in the 71st program of "Teyvat Broadcasting Station", Ayumi Murase, who plays Venti, will be joining the show as the main personality!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1668937583181668352</color>

A bard that seems to have arrived on some unknown wind — sometimes sings songs as old as the hills, and other times sings poems fresh and new.
Likes apples and lively places but is not a fan of cheese or anything sticky.
When using his Anemo power to control the wind, it often appears as feathers, as he's fond of that which appears light and breezy.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Jean</color>
Acting Grand Master Jean... Well, what do you think of her? Yes, I couldn't agree more: conscientious, courageous... kind and considerate too. Reminds me of another good friend...

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Diluc</color>
I'm not surprised you want to befriend Master Diluc. Just think of all the vintage wine he must have stored away... Mwuhahaha... Huh? He doesn't let you sample it? Not even the slightest drop? Huh... Well, I guess you can still appreciate the aroma. That's still better than no wine at all, right? No?

customize.name: Barbara
customize.desc: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Barbara</color>
The darling Deaconess with the sweet singing voice — do you know her? You do? Idol, huh? Meet and greets? Concerts? Wow... That's the power of music for you...
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Venti's voice is amazing! But the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Razor</color>
Ah yes, the white-haired fellow from Wolvendom? Raised by wolves? Really? ... No wonder his scent is so familiar...
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Razor doesn't know poems, but... Lupical likes them.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Mona</color>
Oh, that astrologer? How should I put it? Fortune-telling and my singing are the same: Both lead to you being so poor you can't even cough up the money for a drink! ...You think that astrology is a cultural tradition, so at least still has some value? Hmph, so rude. In that case, so too is singing, so it still has its value too!
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Venti? The bard that sits around doing nothing all day? What's so interesting about him? Sure, I guess I can take a look... Huh, that's weird, the scryglass, it's... I can't see a thing... this wind... I can't... open my eyes! No, my hat! Ah! My clothes, stop! The wind's going to strip all my clothes off! Make it stop, make it stop! ...Alright, alright! I'll never do this again!

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
There's a special drink known far and wide at Cat's Tail. But it ah... ahh... ACHOO! *sniffs* How about you go and fetch one for me? I'll be truly thankful, I promise.
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Venti? I'm not familiar with him... He's a bard? Oh, he must be that guy who sings tunes to entertain the drunkards. Well, then I don't like him, no no no...

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
How do you explain white chalk in black soil, or the earth's dense crust amidst the emptiness of space? Same reason the purest soil gave birth to human life... It's an ancient power with unmistakable properties. Trying to harness it is dangerous indeed, I can't imagine what would happen if someone lost control of it in the city... Ah, never mind! What goes on within Mondstadt's walls is up to Mondstadt's people to deal with!

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Morax</color>
Have you seen that gentleman around? Huh? He's just a normal man by the name of Zhongli now? That must be quite the change for that old block-head. Come with me to see him, will you? I have a vintage I dug up from Windrise that I can take as a condolence gift. Oh, ahh... did he still seem strong when you saw him? How strong? Am I likely to get blown away?
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
*sniff* Tsk... It reeks of wine. That bard has just been through here, hasn't he? That drunkard is a disgrace to the arts. Oh... Has he tricked you into getting drunk? You're slurring a little. Wait a moment, I'll brew a pot of sobering tea. It'll be ready in only six hours, so just wait a moment.

customize.name: Eula
customize.desc: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Eula</color>
Eula has good taste when it comes to beverages of the alcoholic variety. Come summer or winter, she always likes them ice-cold. That's rare among Mondstadters these days! She and I would make great drinking buddies. Huh? My songs about the Lawrence Clan... She's heard them already? Eh, no harm done. Maybe she and I can do a duet sometime!
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
I heard that bard sing a few songs about the Lawrence Clan... They were lighthearted and funny stories that mocked the clan in a way I've never heard anyone else do. Even I couldn't help but burst out laughing... And for this, he must pay!

customize.name: Raiden Shogun
customize.desc: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Baal</color>
So, I hear you defeated the mighty Raiden Shogun? Ah, I recall the days when she was a kagemusha, seeking to perfect her martial prowess. Hehe, she now no doubt employs a wide range of reasoning to get you to train with her. Oh but yes, come close and I shall let you in on her weakness — desserts!
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Hmm. So, the Anemo Archon still goes by that name among mortals these days? Truth be told, from the very first moment I met him, I could somehow sense that we were not going to get along. Also, he sure can drink a lot.

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Buer</color>
The first thing you think of when you hear "Dendro Archon" is her power over dreams. Her dreams are akin to my ballads: full of emotion and imagination. It goes without saying that we get along really well.

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
I really like that bard... He's a very talented performer, and his melodies always seem to make me feel at home. If I had to pick a tune that best represents Mondstadt, it'd definitely be one of his. It's too bad that I'm not often in the city, otherwise, I could bring him some gifts every day...

customize.name: Rosaria
customize.desc: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
There's something extremely interesting about this bard... I can't quite put my finger on it. There's something that makes him different from the others in Mondstadt.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Venti? So that's the name he goes by. His tunes are... forget it.

desc.text: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> , each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

<color=#ffd780>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80ffd7>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by <color=#ffd780>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80ffd7>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Targets who take DMG from <color=#ffd780>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80ffd7>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Slime Secretions
materials.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Slime Secretions
materials.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.name: Slime Concentrate
materials.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

materials.name: Tail of Boreas
materials.desc:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!
<color=#ffd780>Tap/Press</color>
Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing <color=#80ffd7>AoE Anemo DMG</color> and launching opponents into the air.
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color>
Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing <color=#80ffd7>AoE Anemo DMG</color> and launching affected opponents into the air.
After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.
In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.

Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Absorption</color>
If the Stormeye comes into contact with <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> , it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.
Holding <color=#ffd780>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=#ffd780>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.

Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Version 2.6 "Zephyr of the Violet Garden" Trailer | Genshin Impact

desc.text:
An unknown bard that came from nowhere. He sometimes sings outdated songs, other times he hums new ones that none have ever heard of.
He likes apples and lively atmospheres, but hates cheese and anything that is slimy.
When channeling Anemo, it appears in the form of feathers, because he likes things that look light.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Back when traveling bard Venti had only been in Mondstadt for a few months, his income was far less than the other more established bards in town. But once he had a few Mora in the pot from his performance, you could be sure he would hurry off to spend it at the same place every time — one of the city's taverns.
Unfortunately for Venti, his childlike appearance meant that his attempts to acquire alcohol failed at every turn.
The first time he was refused service, he was heard grumbling: "I'm sure there were no such preposterous regulations last time I was here..." Once he realized that the same rule applied to all taverns in town, he decided he would have to change his approach...
The strategy he developed was drinking on the job — that is to say, playing the lyre while holding a wine cup in his mouth, urging his audience to buy him a drink from the bar if they liked his performances instead of giving him Mora.
The novelty of this made him quite popular in Mondstadt.
There was just one snag — he couldn't help but sneeze if a cat came close...
And if he happened to be holding a wine cup in his mouth when it happened... needless to say, it would spell disaster.
Venti, therefore, has one golden rule when selecting a spot to perform, and that is that there must be no cats in the vicinity.
Easier said than done — the stray cats of Mondstadt seem to be quite drawn to him.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
There is a towering oak tree at the center of Windrise, said to have sprouted when Vennessa ascended to the heavens a millennium ago.
In the past few months, travelers resting in the shade of the great oak sometimes hear a young boy singing the tales of Barbatos, the Anemo Archon.
Unlike the ruling deities of the other nations, Barbatos has long left Mondstadt. In fact, the only visible proof of his connection with Mondstadt is the Statues of The Seven that appear across the land — even then, the resemblance is vague at best. Fortunately, Barbatos's past deeds are recorded in books and epics, sung and passed on by the bards.
In contrast to these more canonical works, Venti's ballads tend to include bizarre adventures and acts of mischief, such as the time that Barbatos pinched the Cryo Archon's scepter and replaced it with a hilichurl's wooden club...
Worshippers of Barbatos are quick to decry these frivolous tales as blasphemous fabrications. But whenever someone confronts Venti about this, his response suggests that he has not an ounce of remorse.
"How can you know that they're fabrications?"
He has a point — even the most devoted sister could not possibly know the details of all of Barbatos's deeds from a millennium ago.
Only Venti knows the truth behind his song lyrics, and it is a truth he hides behind an enigmatic smile.
Reason being, yes — Venti's tall tales of Barbatos's unorthodox exploits are entirely fabricated.
Hey, Venti finds that a few drinks really gets his muse going. Can you really blame him?

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Around 2,600 years ago, the Archon War had yet to end, and the world had yet to fall under the dominion of The Seven.
In those days, the city called "Mondstadt" was surrounded on all sides by gales impenetrable even to the birds of the air. The wind's ceaseless howling ground the soil and the rock of that city into smooth, flowing dust.
The Lord of Wind who lived in his high tower was Decarabian, God of Storms. He squinted from on high at his subjects, who bowed before him in the unceasing wind, and, believing them submissive, thought this good.
In those days, Venti was but a single thread of the thousand winds that roared through the northern lands.
He who would in latter days be known as "Barbatos" was but a tiny elemental spirit, without a shred of divine dignity, a breeze that brought subtle changes for the better, or tiny seeds of hope.
In Mondstadt of old, Venti met a young boy. This lad knew how to play the lyre, and longed to write the greatest poem of all.
"I do so wish to see the birds in flight."
So said the boy who had never seen the blue sky, eagles, or the green grass, his voice almost utterly drowned by the wind.
"Friend, will you not come along?"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
The elemental being Venti obtained the feather of an eagle for the lad living in that storm-shrouded city, who had never seen a bird in his life.
Then, war broke out in Mondstadt, in the name of freedom.
With the feather tucked away in his breast pocket, Venti watched the fall of the eccentric ruler amid the wrack and ruin of revolt together with his friend.
The ruler had believed that he had given his subjects a city free from the bitter cold, and to the end, he believed that they had loved him as he loved them.
Yet, despite the victory, Venti was never able to give that feather to the lad, for that lad had fallen in the battle for the sake of song, sky, and birds, and for the people who, like him, had dwelled within the storm-wall.
With the crumbling of an ancient seat of divinity, a new god was born. The Anemo Archon Barbatos felt power flowing at his fingertips.
His first use of this power was to reconstitute himself in the likeness of that young lad.
For only if he wore human shape could he play the lyre that the lad so loved.
Plucking its strings, he scattered the ice and snow and split the mountains with a divine wind.
He bade Mondstadt become a city of freedom, a nation without a king.
In future, he believed, it would become a better, more romantic city.
"Surely, he too would have wanted to live in such a place."
Thus, a new age began for Mondstadt.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
The Anemo Archon cannot take credit for everything in Mondstadt.
Credit should be given where credit is due, I shall sing now the praises of things beauteous and true:
We thank the West Wind, whose enduring caress
Brings the blossoms of Spring, by whose scent we are blessed.
Finches, ducks, rabbits and boars,
Mondstadt's revival bid them thrive evermore.
In summer the lion walks the plains,
No words one finds to praise it but these:
Do you sweat out your water to make way for wine?
Comes the heat of the summer from your mane of sunshine?
The mountain mouths and gorges low like drunkards wayward lie...
But the East Wind cares not, for it doesn't walk — it flies!
Over the fruit trees it brushes low,
And its wings bring the harvest of things that grow.
The North Wind in the silent forest slumbers,
And around it pace the wolves in their numbers.
Though most have never a glimpse of them seen, for the Wind knows that none is of winter too keen,
Yet the Anemo Archon glimpses and sees, that it dreams each night of warm reverie.
—As the four seasons in turn shall say their piece, so the four winds too shall never cease.
Of course, to look at it differently, I am the one who should be credited here, and not they.
Credits should be given where credits belong — if not for the bard who pens the song, then who shall ensure that these tales are passed on?

story.title: Where the Wind Doth Not Blow

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
After 1,600 years of history, Mondstadt's "freedom" had sunk to a heretofore unseen low.
Barbatos, unwilling to become a tyrant, had departed. But he had never imagined that those to whom he had gifted freedom would make for themselves a tyrant.
The aristocracy ruled Mondstadt with a cruel hand, bringing slaves into this land and ignoring the cries of the oppressed.
Thus the Anemo Archon returned after these 1,600 years to what was once the City of Freedom. He heard the cry of the slave girl Vennessa, and together with her raised a rebellion that overthrew the aristocracy.
—Now, the above is what all know to be the official history of Mondstadt.
The story has an interesting, little-known twist, however.
The one who united the people of Mondstadt in this conflict was indeed the hero Vennessa — but that which caused many of the aristocracy's troops to turn coat was a "treachery against the wind."
A secret treaty was found, a betrayal of the city — the aristocrats had forsaken the wind, and sold everything in Mondstadt to the Geo Archon of the neighboring land.
At the treaty's end was carved an insignia inimitable by all save the deity so named: Rex Lapis.
How the soldiers that had once oppressed the slaves shuddered when they saw that they too would become slaves in a foreign land.
The news, and the conflict, spread like wildfire, consuming the aristocracy. It was only many years later that historians would discover that this treaty was fake.
As it turned out, Venti had once practiced the art of forgery in order to play pranks on the Geo Archon, but could never deceive the god of wealth and transactions. Even so, his adeptness would come into play after several hundred years.
What a happy coincidence.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
The Seven Archons do not need Visions, for they already have great power.
Yet Barbatos was fond of the mortal world, and wanted to roam Mondstadt more freely as "Venti." As such, he constructed a glass ornament very much like the Visions worn by those chosen by the gods.
The imitation has no special abilities, nor does Venti rely on it to channel elemental power.
However, since Venti does not keep the Holy Lyre der Himmel by his side, and since he is too lazy to bring a normal lyre, he gave his fake Vision the ability to turn into the wooden lyre "Der Frühling."

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: *Yawn* That was a refreshing sleep. Ah, Traveler, we meet again! What? You don't remember me? Ahaha, well, allow me to join you on your quest once again. I must see to it that the bards of the world tell the Traveler's tales!

voice.title: Chat: Playing the Lyre
voice.desc: Sure, I'll play you another tune, but it'll cost you an apple.

voice.title: Chat: Apple Cider
voice.desc: Right now I wish I was sitting at the top of a tree, looking out over a meadow, cider in hand...

voice.title: Chat: Ballads
voice.desc: Come on Traveler, let's go! The world is full of lost ballads just waiting to be rediscovered.

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Let's go jumping in puddles and see who can make the biggest splash!

voice.title: After the Rain
voice.desc: It's stopped raining already? A shame, I wanted to play some more.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Let's wait till the snow gets heavier and have a snowball fight!

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: The wind has returned! Quick, let's go gliding!

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning! Ah... what's in store for today?

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: My tummy is rumbling, but I can't get caught pilfering food from the Dawn Winery again... Oh, it's you! Where are you heading? May I join?

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Hmm, I'm still not sleepy. Fancy an evening stroll?

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Off to the land of nod? Haha, farewell, my friend!

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc: Practice? Me? There's no need — I already know every song in Teyvat!

voice.title: About Us: New Songs
voice.desc: I have decided to write a song about you! What are you giving me that look for? Can't afford it? Don't be preposterous, the price for you, my friend, is precisely zero Mora! Although... one thing you could do is tell me a few more of your stories!

voice.title: About Us: Heroes
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Haha, once the hero/heroine in the song has actually rescued the princess/prince, I will ensure this song spreads to every corner of the continent!

voice.title: About Us: Apostles
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

Ahh... an evening breeze really sets the mood for becoming my disciple, don't you think? We can do it right now... you just need to make me a small offering...

voice.title: About Us: Requests
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

What's that? You think I should try harder to be a good Anemo Archon? Well, you could be a better devotee too... you could be more pious, more passionate, or... um...

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Hmm? You want to know about my Vision? Oh, go on then, take a look for yourself. I can make you a matching one if you like! Hehehe.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: Olah! Haha, that's how the Hilichurls say "hello." Why, I learned it to aid with my songwriting, of course! Vast knowledge makes for a richer composition... That said, I haven't actually written any songs in Hilichurlian so far...

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Traveler, have you ever seen a Cecilia? It's a magnificent white wildflower that only grows on the most remote mountains and clifftops. To me, at least, it is the most beautiful flower in all of Teyvat.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Acting Grand Master Jean... Well, what do you think of her? Yes, I couldn't agree more: conscientious, courageous... kind and considerate too. Reminds me of another good friend...

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I'm not surprised you want to befriend Master Diluc. Just think of all the vintage wine he must have stored away... Mwuhahaha... Huh? He doesn't let you sample it? Not even the slightest drop? Huh... Well, I guess you can still appreciate the aroma. That's still better than no wine at all, right? No?

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The darling Deaconess with the sweet singing voice — do you know her? You do? Idol, huh? Meet and greets? Concerts? Wow... That's the power of music for you...

voice.title: About Razor
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Ah yes, the white-haired fellow from Wolvendom? Raised by wolves? Really? ... No wonder his scent is so familiar...

voice.title: About Mona
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh, that astrologer? How should I put it? Fortune-telling and my singing are the same: Both lead to you being so poor you can't even cough up the money for a drink! ...You think that astrology is a cultural tradition, so at least still has some value? Hmph, so rude. In that case, so too is singing, so it still has its value too!

voice.title: About Diona
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

There's a special drink known far and wide at Cat's Tail. But it ah... ahh... ACHOO! *sniffs* How about you go and fetch one for me? I'll be truly thankful, I promise.

voice.title: About Albedo
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

How do you explain white chalk in black soil, or the earth's dense crust amidst the emptiness of space? Same reason the purest soil gave birth to human life... It's an ancient power with unmistakable properties. Trying to harness it is dangerous indeed, I can't imagine what would happen if someone lost control of it in the city... Ah, never mind! What goes on within Mondstadt's walls is up to Mondstadt's people to deal with!

voice.title: About Morax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "A New Star Approaches"

Have you seen that gentleman around? Huh? He's just a normal man by the name of Zhongli now? That must be quite the change for that old block-head. Come with me to see him, will you? I have a vintage I dug up from Windrise that I can take as a condolence gift. Oh, ahh... did he still seem strong when you saw him? How strong? Am I likely to get blown away?

voice.title: About Eula
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Eula has good taste when it comes to beverages of the alcoholic variety. Come summer or winter, she always likes them ice-cold. That's rare among Mondstadters these days! She and I would make great drinking buddies. Huh? My songs about the Lawrence Clan... She's heard them already? Eh, no harm done. Maybe she and I can do a duet sometime!

voice.title: About Baal
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Omnipresence Over Mortals"

So, I hear you defeated the mighty Raiden Shogun? Ah, I recall the days when she was a kagemusha, seeking to perfect her martial prowess. Hehe, she now no doubt employs a wide range of reasoning to get you to train with her. Oh but yes, come close and I shall let you in on her weakness — desserts!

voice.title: About Buer
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

The first thing you think of when you hear "Dendro Archon" is her power over dreams. Her dreams are akin to my ballads: full of emotion and imagination. It goes without saying that we get along really well.

voice.title: More About Venti: I
voice.desc: Perfect timing, Traveler! I was about to ask you — what is your greatest wish?

voice.title: More About Venti: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

There's never a dull moment traveling with you! The only minor inconvenience is that pesky little pixie thing that follows you everywhere... She never stops eating — I can't begin to imagine how much you spend on food!

voice.title: More About Venti: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The Pyro Archon is a wayward, warmongering wretch, and the Geo Archon is a brutish, blundering buffoon! How do I know? Because, this is written in the epic poems of days gone by!

voice.title: More About Venti: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Celestia... I'm not sure even I could fly that far. In any case, the water there tastes foul, and the fruit is bland. You know what that means? No cider! Haha, in that case, I wouldn't go there even if I was invited.

voice.title: More About Venti: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

My greatest wish? It has always been to roam free and experience the whole world. Now, I would add that wherever I go, it simply must be with you! Each day with you is an adventure, and where adventurers go, storytellers must follow!

voice.title: Venti's Hobbies
voice.desc: I like to drink! And I like the wind! If only there were such a thing as wind-brewed cider...

voice.title: Venti's Troubles
voice.desc: I'm actually highly allergic to cats. I start sneezing as soon as they enter the vicinity, and... Aah... Aa-choo! Ugh, apparently I can't even THINK about cats without sneezing. Do you think there is a cure for this monstrous affliction?

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Here, have an apple. I just picked it. Look how ripe and juicy it is... *munching* ... Truly the fruit of the gods.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Hmm, what's that tasty morsel you've got there...? Eww! A melted cheese pancake? A smelly, sticky, slimy, disgusting mess!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Ahh, quite delightful! So... could I get the same again tomorrow? ...And maybe the day after that?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Oof, I'm so full... I'll have to pass on the post-meal fruits this time...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: I can't believe it, but I don't think I can stomach this... Oh boy... What a predicament.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Someone once told me you're supposed to eat a cake on your birthday... Tada! Here's your birthday cake — it's apple-flavored! And here's a spoon. The cake didn't rise properly in the oven... That's why it looks more akin to an apple pie... Ugh, baking is really quite complicated!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 1

Woah! What was that?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 2

Good work. Shall we repose for a moment with a tune? Shall it be a capriccio or a serenade?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 4

Come, sit with me. I've written a new poem. I call it "Wind of the Traveler."

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 6

Hmm... Though I've long since viewed this scenery a great many times, there is something different about seeing it again with you. Surely you're not still concealing some other wondrous abilities? Hmm, even if you were, it would simply further prove that my intuition is correct.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Yoo-Hoo!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Here we go!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Brace yourselves!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Let's play!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Think you can get away?

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Time for takeoff!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Wouldn't gliding be faster?

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: Yahoo!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: *clears throat* Have you heard The Ballad of the Treasure Chest?

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Thank Barbatos! Wait a minute...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: What a find! I wonder how many bottles this'll be worth...

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Ugh, I'm not in the mood for this!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Oh, dear!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: That was uncalled for.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Let me try!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Don't give up!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Let me sleep a while...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Oh no, my lyre is broken...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Ah... Ugh...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ah!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: How rude!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Give me a moment to compose myself.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Didn't keep you waiting, did I?

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Ready for a rehearsal?

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Breezy Ode
Venti's outfit. The clothes of a carefree bard.

value.name: Venti: Azure Sky
value.desc:
Namecard style.
The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.

value.name: Echo: Windborne Bard
value.desc: Venti's Envisaged Echo. "As free as the wind, I shall sing now the praises of things beauteous and true."

value.name: A Buoyant Breeze
value.desc: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps... this is exactly what he wants.

value.name: Venti
value.desc:
"Windborne Bard" Venti

"As the four seasons in turn shall say their piece, so the four winds too shall never cease.

"Of course, to look at it differently, I am the one who should be credited here, and not they."

Credits should be given where credits belong — if not for the bard who pens the song, then who shall ensure that these tales are passed on!?"
